
## Creating the HMP example dataset

### Sample data

```{r}
library(readr)
sample_data <- read_tsv("~/Downloads/v35_map_uniquebyPSN.txt")
```

remove uneeded columns

```{r}
sample_data <- sample_data[, c("#SampleID", "sex", "HMPbodysubsite")]
```

rename columns

```{r}
colnames(sample_data) <- c("sample_id", "sex", "body_site")
```

subset treatments

```{r}
sites <- c("Saliva", "Throat", "Stool", "Right_Antecubital_fossa", "Anterior_nares")
```
